body: Living organisms Bodysuit have  lot cons, one is that very critical disadvantage that even scientist can't control it, that cloth is live and can evolve be more smarter then disobey it master, also it take more money and "maintenance cost". The solution is suppresed drug which course can only delay time.

This one's pretty nice! I like her design, and the context and plot is fairly good, too! Would love to see a sequel where the scientist begins developing more suits and having the women become his "servants."
